CustomField.description:
Total count of all cases created in the past 30 days where the reason is not Status/Inquiry and the record type is 02. Customer Inquiry. This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_of_Issues_Last_30_Days__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of all Issue cases for related accounts created in the last 30 days.
CustomField.label: Issues Last 30 Days
